Primary Service Areas

Fast response times throughout Central California

Monterey Bay Area

Primary Coverage: Monterey, Carmel, Pacific Grove, Seaside, Marina, Sand City, Del Rey Oaks

Response Time:

Same day service • Emergency response within 2 hours

Typical Projects:

  • • Luxury hotels and resorts
  • • Vacation rental properties
  • • Commercial buildings
  • • Restaurants and retail

Salinas Valley

Primary Coverage: Salinas, Hollister, Gilroy, Gonzales, Soledad, Greenfield, King City

Response Time:

Same day service • Local technicians based in Hollister

Typical Projects:

  • • Agricultural facilities
  • • Office complexes
  • • Manufacturing plants
  • • Educational facilities

Santa Cruz County

Primary Coverage: Santa Cruz, Capitola, Scotts Valley, Watsonville, Aptos, Soquel

Response Time:

Same day service • 1-hour response for emergencies

Typical Projects:

  • • Beach resort properties
  • • University facilities
  • • Tech company offices
  • • Healthcare facilities

San Francisco Bay Area

Response Time: Scheduled service • Large project consultation

Local Expertise

Deep knowledge of Central California's unique requirements

Coastal Conditions

Salt air and moisture considerations for hardware selection and corrosion resistance. Specialized finishes and materials for coastal environments.

Seismic Requirements

California seismic building code compliance for access control and door hardware installations. Earthquake-resistant mounting and anchoring.

Energy Efficiency

Title 24 energy code compliance, automatic door operators for air infiltration control, and energy-efficient solutions.

Local Contractors

Established relationships with regional general contractors, architects, and construction managers for seamless project coordination.
